title: The Space between the door and the floor
creator_credit: Pauline Chan, AFTRS and Andrew O'Sullivan
brief_description: He sits alone in his office waiting for the girl of his dreams. When she comes, he will see her approach in the space between the bottom of the door and the floor. He lights a cigarette and waits … In the space between the door and the floor there lies a sliver of light in a dark world of fantasy and desire.
